I'm being blocked by this deadlock issue here:

https://mvvmlight.codeplex.com/workitem/7581

Is there an easy way to get around this? Or should I just implement my own messenger with the fix recommended in the work item?

I too (I think) am being deadlocked by this issue. I see that there was a pull reuqest and it seems is "being evaluated".

I would love to see this get merged into the trunk and an updated nuget package become available with the fix.
The handler for one of my messages was doing an Invoke on the dispatcher, which in turn sent more messages. I got around it by doing an InvokeAsync.
